ygData.subject: Code freeze: Preparing for 1.0.0 release.
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a heads up that we re preparing to release 1.0.0 by the end of this week.  We re currently moving internal crawls to CVS HEAD to make sure alls well

Subject: Code freeze: Preparing for 1.0.0 release.
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=168599281

Just a heads up that we're preparing to release 1.0.0 by the end of this 
week.  We're currently moving internal crawls to CVS HEAD to make sure 
alls well crawling and there's a few contention issues we're looking in 
to but otherwise all planned 1.0.0 features are in and critical bugs are 
believed fixed.  Speak up if you believe otherwise!
Yours,
The Heritrix Release Committee
